info.description:
hello so I created this interactive because I am a French (gay) who fantasizes about American football uniforms and the smell that smells.

so in this interactive everything is about football (american football), you would become a player's slave, he only has football players and you in this world so everyone except you will be in uniform all the time (choose uniform). he wears the match uniform even outside the field or even when he sleeps they are almost 24 hours in their uniform.

you have become immotelle, this means no death or fainting but you continue to suffer and your body reacts like a normal human without having blood (crushing, flattening, bone breaker, etc. but after a while you regain form ).
footballers because he will have only footballers, will be mean to you because for them, you are a shabby with whom he can play.

you are not a footballer so you will be naked or shirtless, of course footballers can play a football match with you as an opponent (you were not allowed to be dressed).

Rules


No women,

permission to play with your height (you could be of normal size or be shrunk by footballers, forbidden for you to be taller than a footballer)

No death (even the footballer can not die),

No fainting for you,

Allow sex (all characters are at least 18 years old because these age for French to be major),

All fetichism are allow,


the action can be in the street, in a room, on the football field, etc (It is therefore a question of allowing the footballers to wear the uniform in the place where they wish),

I remind you that this story is about American football, smells, crushed and STINK
